task.summary: Default task
Rendering and object management reworked yet again. Some level generation tweaks.
Chapters and stages implemented, levels transition implemented, maze generation updated, title screen updated, etc.
Chapters and stages implemented, levels transition implemented, maze generation updated, title screen updated, etc.
Input field fixes, typography module update, display resize procedure fixed.
Character save and load implemented.
Savegame works fully as intended. Demo scenes implemented. Preview of character's inventory, skills and stats added. Cooldown works everywhere. A lot of bugs fixed.
Savegame works fully as intended. Demo scenes implemented. Preview of character's inventory, skills and stats added. Cooldown works everywhere. A lot of bugs fixed.
A lot of bugs fixed.
Hardcore mode added. Bugs fixed.
Demo updated. Mistakes fixed. Options win added.
Bugs fixed.
More names added.
Traps, burglary skills for Kingslayer, food added. Fixed mistakes, optimised code, reworked some things.
Readme updated
Tables updated
Skills update
Trading Post implemented, many things updated.
Readme updated.
Trading Post delivery added. Chests added! Enemies aggro on being hit and other things.
Another major update.
Sounds added.
Sounds added.
Sounds added.
Sounds added.
Stereo sound panning added.
Version string fix.
Project renaming.
Title screen updated, sounds updated, animation updated.
Stashes added, armor added, armor calculations fixed, more sounds added, splitter window added.
Bug fixes, balance updates, items updates.
Mistakes fixes.
Mistakes fixes.
Mistakes fixes.
Minor fixes.

* Database has been updated: - New affixes and modifiers have been added. - Grade-related tables have been added. - Stage stats of testing chapter have been tweaked. * Loot affixes and affix color-coding now work. * Various calculations have been updated and fixed where necessary. * Dedicated tileset for chapter thumbnail pic has been added.

* New test chapter ("Layered Maze") with static levels. * No affixed items in Trade Post. * Container unpacking: loot drops on adjust squares. - Bug fixed when loot was dropping behind the walls or obstacles. * All potions have cross-cooldown. - All potions now has only up to nine gulps. - Potion prices and effects adjusted. * Spells "Magical Arrow" and "Dispel" have been added. You can find them in Cosmologist's skillbook. - To cast a spell you have to hold a magical weapon in your main hand. - Magical weapon "Wand" has been added. * Starting equipment for all characters has been adjusted. * Ambient monster sounds have been disabled. * New sounds have been added. * Other minor fixes.

* Default skill for Kingslayer has been changed to melee attack. * Dedicated sprites for Kingslayer and Cosmologist have been added, Champion sprite has been modified. * Skeleton monster sprite has been added. * Quest items code has been modified. - Now any item can be a Quest item. * Grates have been added. * Chest sprites have been modified. * Now you can have up to 10 character saves. - Title menu layout has been modified. * Necessary Database updates. * Other minor fixes.

* World view has been altered. - Now it's not a complete darkness behind the light circle, but basic maze layout without object or monsters. * Debuffs for the enemies have been implemented. * New item effects. * Projectiles for enemies has been added. * New enemies have been added. * New visual marks for higher-graded enemies. * New animations. * Monsters behavior has been altered. * Rates altered. * Other minor fixes.

* Old maze render returned. * Maze generation tweaked. * Loot generation tweaked. * New Character buff added. * Certificates and Spellbooks added. * Skill targeting altered (more intuitive and streamlined now) * Lots of fixes.
* Main menu fixes and updates. * New monsters. * Ravenstone test chapter tweaks. * Monsters and traps generation updates and tweaks. * Level progressions tweaks. * New items (rings). * Error fixes.

* Intro added: - Intro subtitles added (no pics and sound yet). * Task system added. - Database updated accordingly. - Tasks window added. * World rendering algorithms tweaked and fixed and everything now looks better. - TEMPORARILY dungeon tiles replaced by placeholder set. Sorry for inconvenience. * Old saves are no longer valid. Create a new character. * Manuscripts added. * Text insertions added. * Some errors and bugs fixed.
* Outro added. * Task system updated. * Dungeon tile art added (1 set and 1 variation). * Chapters in progress are no longer valid. Start a new chapter. * Some errors and bugs fixed.
* Mimics added * Database updated * New affixes and new modifiers added * Texts updated * Sound effects updated * Skill calculations corrected * Monsters code optimized * Errors fixed * Other updates

* Tiles randomization option added. * Skill calculations fixed. * Visual effects updated. * New monster: zombie. * UI updated. * PC updated. * Crafting updated. * Treasure updated. * Errors fixed. * Other updates.
* Inventory size increased to 48 items. * Stash size increased to 100 items. * "Sort" buttons added to inventory and stash.

* Gradient vision shading added. * Colorful vision shading added. * Daily loot drop boost buff added. * Surprise Visit buff on floor entry added. * New quests added. * Furniture objects added. * Mini-chapter added.
* Levers added. * Auto-map added. * Intro and ending images added. * Algorithms updated. * Database updated. * Balance corrected. * Errors fixed.
* Tweaks and stuff.
* Tweaks and stuff.
